website_summaries.verdict: Wheeled style bag works well for carrying extra bats for a team or for individual players.
pros: Will hold up to four bats in padded sleeves for protection
Ships with two hooks for hanging on the dugout fence for convenience
Contains a shelf inside the main compartment to help you organize you gear however you want
Huge storage area inside  will hold plenty of gear
Includes wheels or two padded straps for moving the bag
cons: More expensive than some other options
Larger than what some people will want

customer_reviews.title: Holds a complete set of youth catching gear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to use for my son's new catching gear. The bag is big enough to fit a youth catching gear set in, but there is not much more room than that. So it works for what we need, although I wish there were a few more pockets on the bag. The pockets that are there on the outside are very small, so I am still looking for a good use on the bag. Overall, the quality of the bag has been good, and it has held up great for the first half of the year. If it holds long term, this could become a five star product, since it is doing exactly what I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: This bag was great for our 8 year old to store catchers gear ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag was great for our 8 year old to store catchers gear in. The only problem is the removable flap won't stay on. We never took it off to monogram, but it just came off and now the zipper won't stay on. We've gotten to the point where we just put everything inside without the flap on and roll it, making sure not to lift it too far upright so nothing falls out. It's also very hard to get bats in the back when the bag is full. It's a great size, and still probably the best we've found, I just wish it was easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hamlett

customer_reviews.title: Good for catchers gear
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. We bought it specifically for catchers gear. It fits his catchers gear nicely. He still has his boombah backpack bag for all his other gear. It isn’t big enough to fit all his baseball gear but we knew that based on the size and price he would still need two bags. Overall happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amfam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Has held up about 14 tournaments, 75 games so far. Large enough to easily fit catcher gear, gloves, balls, batting helmet and cleats. Well made. Bag itself is lightweight which is great since I carry so much stuff in it. It rolls easily on hard surfaces, grass and field dirt. Wheels are still in perfect condition a year later. I foresee another few years use out of this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: No bottom rails!!! Not for catchers gear!!!
customer_reviews.text: Returning this product since it has no bottom rails. Too many of these pictures show these bags looking quite rigid when in fact they are duffel bags with wheels. If it’s not completely stuffed it crumpled and doesn’t quite roll correctly. I suggest showing the bottoms of these bags with wheels. This bag will tear it seems with minimal effort after being dragged around a baseball field and handled as intended. Picture clearly shows catchers gear in the compartment however the details contradict this by saying “Not Intended to hold catchers gear”. Not sure who authorized the pictures but this is deceptive marketing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Trifillis

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a U14 catcher
customer_reviews.text: While the bag is pretty nice, it is SO small. It's like playing tetris with every pack up. My daughter catches, so she needs two helmets, (2) gloves, face mask, shin guards and chest protector - and the (2) bats.....I've been packing her bag since she's received this because it's frustrating after a loss or a win when everyone is yelling to get out of the dug out to meet with the coaches and let the next team in. So.....while this works, it doesn't at the same time.......we simply need a bigger one. But it is a nice bag...overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kate K.

customer_reviews.title: Great baseball/softball bag, great look, very functional.
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks great, lots of space and does not look really bulky, the only reason why I did not give it 4 stars is because the straps to hold it like a back pack are flying around like crazy, would have liked some kind of velcro strap or something to hold them together or in place when not in use, it's something I can fix but would have liked that it was included. I really recommend this bag, holds my 3 bats, helmet, 2 pairs of cleats, my glove, wallet, batting gloves and the wheels make it easy to cart around.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great for catchers
customer_reviews.text: We've had this bag for about a season and a half now. Kid takes it 5 days a week to baseball practices and games. Sits a little lopsided unless loaded perfectly. Bats are tough to get in and out for the boys unless their catchers gear isn't in there. This bag is perfect for a kid who plays catcher, plenty of room for that gear plus a batters helmet compartment. The batters helmet compartment is great for access in the dugout when the bag is hung up too! My son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: Great to store catchers gear and batting gear
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for my 9 year old sons catchers gear (helmet, vest and leg guards) and his batting helmet and two gloves and his bat. Plenty of room in this bag and comes with wheels so you can roll the bag. You can also carry it like a backpack if you want. I would recommend to anyone who needs to carry a lot of equipment
customer_reviews.author: Dk

customer_reviews.title: Not a great bag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son because his backpack had no more room for baseball stuff. I thought this was going to be a great buy...it's not. The bottom between the wheels rubs on the ground so the fabric is already gone which means there is a huge hole at the bottom of the bag. We went back to using his backpack.
customer_reviews.author: MMacGregor

customer_reviews.title: bottom is NOT reinforced
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 11 and catches. The bag was the perfect color for her team and fit all her catching gear. It would have been great but after 2 uses the bottom is getting holes in it. SUPER disappointed, so is my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon George

customer_reviews.title: Bag is light, strong and Carrys everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Bag gets its rigidity from the bats. It's the perfect size for everybody but catchers. My boys carry 3 bats, 2 or 3 gloves, helmet, cleats, water bottles and some baseballs. Was getting heavy and found 6 water bottles and 9 balls inside. They love them and for this price you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It said that it hold 4 bats size 34". But only fit size 32'..
customer_reviews.author: José M Sánchez

customer_reviews.title: Zippers and bat compartment both failed
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, feel, and size of the bag. But the zippers broke pretty shortly after we bought it, which renders it useless for air travel. The bat compartment is just a very thin liner, and it's begun to tear away from where it's stitched to the interior of the bag. Still great for use at local practices and games, but the whole reason we bought it was check at the airport (my son doesn't catch, so he doesn't really need a bag this big on an everyday basis) and now we can't!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Dissatisfied with this purchase. Have had it for 11 months and it has not held up and my son takes good care of the bag. Within a month a small hole appeared on near the wheels and now the top zipper compartment has completely come apart. Now I have to purchase a new back and will not purchase this brand again. I ignored the previous reviews...please do not waste your money as the bag is poor quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but...
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks great however it's not functional. You can fit about 4 inside the bag but you have to completely empty the bag in order to get to them. Then you have to empty the bag in order to store them again. I can't believe how little thought was put into bat storage. I'm returning it tomorrow...
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal with plenty of space
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had it about a month now. She is a catcher and pitcher so we were looking for a bag that could hold all of her gear. This works perfectly with room to spare. The only thing it doesn’t have that I wish it did was a dedicated slot to slide her cleats/slides like her other bags have. Other then that it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: It's working well so far, but the health crisis has put a stall on the true test - the season. One thing, the two zippered areas go to the same compartment, the picture makes it seem like there are two compartments. It holds catchers gear, but tight with everything else that is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gambo

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my daughter needed a bag for her catcher's gear. I was amazed how easily we were able to fit everything. 2 helmets, 2 gloves, leg guards, chest protector, face mask, cleats & bats. Plus now I don't have to help her organize everything in order for it to fit. Plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: great - just too small for us.
customer_reviews.text: nice heavy duty wheeled bag - will not fit a 12 year old's batting helmet & bats, a fielding glove, and full catcher's gear all at once - so we had to send it back to try to find what we need. nice sized wheels - heavy duty - great straps for carrying - nice bag - just too small for us. heavy duty fabric & nice looking. possibly could hold all the gear of a 8-9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Russell R. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My two daughters have the Voodoo Rebirth backpacks which I am very happy with so when we needed a bag for my one daughter’s catching gear it was a no brainer. This bag has plenty of room for her catchers gear, catchers mitt and more. It also has a separate compartment for bats but my daughter like to keep them on her backpack with her fielding mitt, helmet and fielders face mask. It can be carried as a backpack but the wheels on it are a big help when walking from field to field during tournaments. She went with the orange and black for both bags which we get a lot of complements on. Extremely happy with both products.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to be a great bag but within 2 weeks of using, the bottom started to wear down and got a hole. I let that go because it happens. Then a few weeks later, the zipper broke and we couldn’t even get through the spring season. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, absolutely hate the lack of stability in the the upper pocket. Using velcro as a support for the bottom of the pocket makes it worthless. It’s my first DeMarini roller bag and I’m definitely disappointed by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looked in picture
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved this bag today 12/19/18. Some reviews are correct. Bag is kinda smallish. 15u Boy I can fit (3) 33" bats and close the zipper fine Both shin guards Chest protector 3 Mits (catcher, outfield,infield) Catchers Mask or Batting helmet... 1 or the other.. not both. misc stuff ( batting gloves, eye black, swing weight etc) So if you want 1 bag to carry everything, i would prob look into the Grind series. Otherwise do like i did and just buy the Dimarinin Backpack for the helmet and shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow pitch softball bats don’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the overall look of the bag. The compartments in the front are well placed, zippers are very easy to move. BUT, my bats don’t fit. I have 3 softball bats and I can’t even zip it up with 1 by itself. That was the biggest but only drawback of this bag. I’d understand if they didn’t make softball bats and didn’t know the length.
customer_reviews.author: xicamom

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as it should be
customer_reviews.text: My grandson used his for an entire season as a catcher. After just one month the outside has tears and splits from use. It should last a little longer than that. I won't be buying this model again.
customer_reviews.author: PattyCat

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, rolls awesome and no more carrying my sons equipment for him! Fits cleats, full catchers gear, two helmets and several bats. However getting everything in the bag takes creativity. I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ld

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My son catches and has a plethora of gear, and this bag holds it all. Very easy to keep organized and easy to pack up. Hold 2 gloves a full youth catchers set with knee sabers and hockey style mask. batting helmet 2 bats with room, and all his other small gear.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hammett

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Literally 2 weeks after purchasing this bag it has 2 holes in the bottom of the bag. I have bought DeMarini baseball bags before and have been very happy with the quality and durability. This bag however did not hold up well at all! I bought the bag for my 12 year old. He used it for 2 weeks, which included 3 games and 4 practices. It just makes sense to me that they would make the fabric a lot more sturdy since it is for sports and for kids. I wouldn't recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my 12u tournament catcher. It’s a great bag for the price. She loves that she can wheel or backpack it. Bag fits snuggly 2 helmets, 2 gloves, 2 bats, catchers gear, cleats. Has good compartment space for phone & batting gloves. Only rating 4 stars as it would be perfect with another inch or two depth and width. Also not sure it’s gonna hold for more then 1 season. Material seems to be thinner and flimsier then our boombah wheeled bag which made it 2 seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag. We got one for the whole team. They look awesome on the fence. They are a tish smaller than we wanted and the wheels are smaller but still a good bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell Nunnelly

customer_reviews.title: Some what small or reduce space
customer_reviews.text: Material it shows as good quality, only an important feature to me that's why I don't give for or five stars, If you put your helmet, shoes, chest protector and lega protector the space reduce it to minimun, no more room for your facemask and important equipment for a catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel A. Vindiola Robles

customer_reviews.title: ripped out of delivery package
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the package the interior divider that separates bat storage from rest of the bag was ripped completely across. Had bag all of 15 minutes after delivery and came damaged. Seems to be very fragile. Don't know how this bag would make through a season let alone multiple seasons. Amazon sent me a return label and I am not sure I will reorder this bag again. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd braun

customer_reviews.title: Some issues but otherwise great bag
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag but it’s not big enough for my catchers gear it takes like 10 minutes to make it fit it all in but I have a felling it’s not for catchers gear so idk. Also it rips easily so I have a lot of little holes in it but the reason for that is because I clip the little hook on my friends bike so we can practice at her house or she can bring me to practice and sometimes it rolls over so that’s technically my fault. I still use it tho because besides those few issues it’s a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina M. Plein

customer_reviews.title: A great bag for catchers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my 9 year old daughter who is a catcher and infielder. Her old bag was not large enough to carry all of her catchers and fielders gear so we decided to give this one a try. She fits full catchers gear, catching glove, fielders glove, batting helmet, cleats, extra softballs and a bat inside with lots of room to spare. Everything has held up after 2 months so far and it has proven to be a great purchase. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 bag needed to carry EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Hold my daughters fielding, batting and catchers equipment all in ONE bag, so no more multiple bags to lug around. Only down side is the pic lead us to believe it could be carried like a backpack, not so much the case. She can make the carrying straps long and then carry like a backpack, only problem is then the straps get all dirty and gross from laying in the dirt,dust and mud.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Carry it, don’t roll it. It will have holes in it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bag for our 11yr old catcher. The size is fine but the quality is less than par. He has gently used it for 1 month and it has frayed edges and holes in the bottom. I will be contacting DeMarini, I can’t see this holding up even half a season. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sharp looking!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our daughter and she loved it! We had the removable patch embroidered and we are constantly being told how nice and sharp this bag looks!
customer_reviews.author: smvalek

customer_reviews.title: Youth Catchers bag
customer_reviews.text: Well this bag is decent but definitely a youth catchers bag. I was able to fit two helmets three gloves shinguards and chest protector but my daughter is 16 and 5 1...and too 32 "bats not 4...but you have to pack it exactly right and no room for cleats...no expandable handle either...we will see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Wrightman

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag on July 18, 2019. Today's date is August 28, 2019 and the bag already has a hole in the bottom. My daughter is a 10U catcher so this bag was VERY tight to begin with. I should have just returned it. We're talking normal wear and tear. Gear in, go to game, use gear, put gear back in, load in the back of SUV and it has a hole in it already. 2 months and we're active probably twice a week and tournaments on weekends. Frustrated...
customer_reviews.author: Amber Autry

customer_reviews.title: Did not even last a year!
customer_reviews.text: This bag did not last at all! It fell apart within the year. The zippers quit working and the bag ripped. all we did was use it for baseball but it did not hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best bag but....
customer_reviews.text: Bag falls over when stood up, also bats wear through top( handle wears through) when set down hitting a hard surface, top zipper compartment only zips open one way...
customer_reviews.author: Darren - Long Island

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Too small for youth catchers.
customer_reviews.text: Some used for one month and bag already has holes in the bottom. My son is 11 and he has 3 bats. He can only place 2 bats in bag regardless of how you position them. Catching gear and batting gear barely fit. Went from an Easton bag that he had for a year and a half to this bag, and this bag shows more wear in only a month. On a good note, Zippers are still holding up, but in time we will see what happens. Looking on for a good durable bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Goss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag, help up well for 1st trip
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag to take on our first trip for the boys tournament! The orange is super nice! Able to spock it in the baggage claim!
customer_reviews.author: JaQ RoD

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Holds A LOT!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for a travel softball player who has a lot of equipment! My daughter uses this constantly and it’s holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: It will get you through a season...maybe.
customer_reviews.text: As some of the other reviews have stated this bag is not holding up well. The zipper broke then the bag tore. Great value but poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bag. It’s a waste of money. My daughter is a catcher and has a lot of gear. The gear fit pretty well, BUT the bottom of the bag started to rip after the first use. Then after 3 weeks of use the zipper on the bat compartment broke off completely. The zippers are not very sturdy. Her previous Easton bag last almost 3 years. We’re going back and buying another Easton.
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen Verrengia

customer_reviews.title: Too small for all my son's equipment. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.text: The bag needs to be deeper in order to hold his catcher's equipment without it bursting at the seams. A couple of inches would make this the perfect bag. We sent it back before he got it smelly and dirty with his equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement bag. It is better than the one we had and a better deal too! This bad gets used lots and it has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Christi King

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: My son take care of its stuff and barely ever break things we bought for him. The seams of this bag starts to rip within less than a month of its used, and he feels so bad about it taking the blame on himself for wasting our money, though we told him not to because this could possibly because of the manufacturing defect to start with so it starts to give way on regular use. Just my bad luck.
customer_reviews.author: Dickson1130

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR 10 YEAR OLDS OR UNDER
customer_reviews.text: This bag is in the right price range. It works great for the gear of a 10U player. It fits their bats that are 30” or less. This fits the youth catchers gear and his other gear fine. I don’t recommend it for the bigger kids with full size gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: straps can be used as backpack
customer_reviews.text: By the PICTURE and one of the questions/comments it looks like it could be used as a backpack (the way the straps are shown). It is not at all possible to be used that way
customer_reviews.author: BTL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Used bat for one tournament and bat compartment zipper broke after about 15 uses. Lucky Amazon has a great refund policy...
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I needed, but make sure your bat size isn't longer than the bad. Softball bat didn't fit with two other baseball bat's. But 4 baseball bat's fit. Definitely not made for softball. But can grow with my son for a while. Very impressed with the space as well. And he loves it, so that's what counts. Easy to use, carry and organize your bag buch better than previous bags we have had.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Aman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This bag did not even last 2 months! The zippers broke, there is a hole in the bottom and there is a tear where the bats go. What a waste! Wish I could give zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: EJS

customer_reviews.title: Youth catching gear fits!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for what we were looking for. Our son is 11 and we needed one bag for all this catching gear, gloves and bats. Things fit rather snug but they fit! We didnt want to pay a fortune this late in the season as we plan to purchase a larger one for Christmas. But if this bag continues to hold up we may not need to. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Noles#1

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Wont stand up,has to be laid down or it falls. Shoe compartment is a Velcro flap that wont hold up the weight of shoes so they fall into the main compartment. After a month of use the fabric separating the compartments is ripping.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to bring it out to the field next season...
customer_reviews.text: Bag looks great. Moved all my stuff from my old bag to the new one. Color is fantastic. Can't really tell the functionality yet.. but all seems to point in the right direction
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pak

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then it looks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my daughter who plays travel softball, the bag is a lot smaller then most catcher bags, her gear alone was a tight fit. The description says it has a bat sleeve compartment for up to 4 bats, the compartment is half the size of the bag so the bats stick out of the top with the gear inside. If you put the bats in first they take up space from the inside of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Genevie

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag to keep catchers gear along with two gloves, batting helmet and bat. Everything is a tight fit and if not placed just right, the bag won’t zip. Bag has only been used for 3 weeks and the bottom already has 2 tears in the fabric. Another important thing to note is that the bag will not stand on its own, so that’s a pain to always lay it down.
customer_reviews.author: brittany rayner

customer_reviews.title: This was actually way better quality that I thought it was going to be
customer_reviews.text: This was actually way better quality that I thought it was going to be ! Very happy and came faster than I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: daniellheiman

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great Size holds all of her gear great quality we have had it for whole season and has held up great with the beating she puts it through
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was able to fit all her catching gear and all her regular gear.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Steger

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything, just not large bats.
customer_reviews.text: Holds all that I need it to. The only problem I have, is that it will not fully close over 34 inch softball bats. Very disappointed in that feature. Would be a great product for little leaguers.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 8 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Fits all of my daughters fathers gear, regular helmet, mask, and glove. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: RandiR

customer_reviews.title: Generally a nice bag, not as durable as I’d have liked.
customer_reviews.text: I generally like DeMarini products but after half a season, the zipper for the bat section broke and the velcro divider in the main section never really stayed put. Kind of a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Krysti

customer_reviews.title: Good size, but holes formed within first three uses.
customer_reviews.text: While the bag is amply sized, three different holes were formed in the within the first 30 days of use. I'm not sure it will last multiple seasons which is disappointing as I expected more from the bag and brand.
customer_reviews.author: A. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: DeMarini Momentum Wheeled Bag
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren play baseball and love this for hauling all their equipment - cost was good. Durable and very useful
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good bag and holds my sons equipment as desired
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good bag and holds my sons equipment as desired. However, with the negligence of a teen and them dragging it to their games, when they are not careful it will quickly develp some holes/fray near the wheels if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Dial

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Started falling apart pretty quick. Zipper on main compartment broke within a month. It's also pretty small for a bag of this type. Should have spent the money on a better bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping for new shoes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses it but it needs more pockets for him
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: Good design, poor materials.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the bag a month ago. The design is good. Fit my 10 year old's catcher's gear, 2 bats, batting helmet, catcher's glove, fielding glove, and other incidentals. My daughter liked it before it fell apart. The zipper for the bat compartment broke. The fabric around the zipper came apart. This of course happens 7 days after the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Chang Zeng

customer_reviews.title: Well built with issues.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built bat and equipment bag. The only issue is the bag will not zip closed with 34" softball bats.
customer_reviews.author: Nanarox

customer_reviews.title: Bat Pocket Too Short
customer_reviews.text: The bag works great. It has plenty of room for all of the catchers gear, cleats, glove and helmet. The one problem we've had with the bad is the pocket created for bats is just a little bit short of fitting a 33" softball bat. With the bat in all the way the knob sticks out of the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Weekend Warrioirs!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Bag for baseball players. Big enough to fir all your gears but could be pretty tight if you're a catcher. My 32" bat fits perfectly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A.

customer_reviews.title: Looked all over to get tight bag, this DeMarini  wheeled bag fit all the qualifications.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fact that it was long enough to hold all of the equipment she needed to catty.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but....
customer_reviews.text: Bat compartment does NOT zip closed with men’s softball bat, bag folds in half and collapses without bat in it. Cannot be worn as backpack. Very heavy duty zippers! Material seems strong.
customer_reviews.author: Scottymo31

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag. Not real good material
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bag and fits all my daughters gear. She is a catcher and 3rd base so she has a lot of gear. She is hard on bags and had a hole in the bottom of the bag in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Linkous

customer_reviews.title: Bag was good construction, good quality and a deal
customer_reviews.text: Bag was good construction, good quality and a deal. However, I was looking for something that would fit all our catching gear. Doesn’t work. My daughters gear fits, but I see the zipper breaking soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: After about half a season, the bottom is wearing out. There isn’t much room for the bats in the back if you have catchers gear inside. There isn’t a decider for the top and bottom pockets.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: It ok if your not using for a big group!
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to get the bats in the back! The Velcro on the top does not stay! So when you put your glove and shoes in there it ends up in the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, material is cheap
customer_reviews.text: Just got this bag for my daughter to hold all her catchers gear and bats. She has had literally 2 practices and there is already a hole in the bottom of the bag. I would expect this for cheaper bags, which is why we paid more for a Demarini bag. My daughter didn't do anything out of the normal, didn't drag the bag on the ground and some how there are holes. Her pervious bag lasted two seasons and she would still be using it if she didn't need something to hold her catchers gear.
customer_reviews.author: James Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Tetris champ
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be a little bigger.. With all the gear you have to be a Tetris champ.. But good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: mike genheimer

customer_reviews.title: Return/Hole in Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for m daughter as she is a catcher. I received it and was very happy with the size and quality. She went to one softball tournament and it already has a hole on the bottom of the bag. Is there some way I can get a replacement bag for the one that is torn? Thank you for your time in advance. Becky
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: Good for kids. NOT for adult softball players. Cannot even hold ONE 34 inch bat. Very flimsy "shelf" in the top pocket. I would not recommend this for adult players, maybe kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Plutchak Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great size not so good material
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a great size for my 12U catcher carries all her catching gear batting helmet and fielding glove if she packs it right she can even fit her sweater and cleats BUT shes used it about 2 weeks now and it already is ripping on the bottom and sides :-/
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bag was of good quality and my boy can fit everything in it, however fitting the catching helmet in the top compartment leaves little room for his batting helmet too!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Wolfgram

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 34" standard softball bats.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is solid. The top compartment is separated only by Velcro, but besides that it's a good bag until you try and store your bats. I have to stretch the bat section until the zipper feels like it's about to break in order to get my standard size softball bats (1-2) in the bag. What a waste of money. I'm in the market for a new bag... again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This bag already has a hole in the bottom, therefore I can only give it a 3 star. It only last a fall season of travel ball.
customer_reviews.author: connerre

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This bag does not feel like a durable material. The bag is smaller than I anticipated although I didn’t look at measurements. My daughter can’t fit any more in the bag than her small backpack bag held. I assumed it would be bigger like a catchers bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fair value for money spent
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok with regular use after about 2 months. Minor inconveniences as there is no rigid pocket for bats. They are a bit difficult to remove and the backpack straps are pretty much useless. Still a good looking bag and works well enough for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Derik

customer_reviews.title: Fits catchers gear, helmet and glove
customer_reviews.text: The bag is big enough for a catcher set, helmet and glove. Could be a little bigger because we have to put it just the way for it to work. But over all a great purchase for my daughter to have all her softball equipment in one spot. Also like that the bat aren’t out in the open and can hit someone
customer_reviews.author: corrie wengerd

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit everything
customer_reviews.text: Gear is hard to fit in. Can't get catchers gear, batting helmet, gloves and bats. Wish it was a bit bigger and as described.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not amazing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my son' catcher's gear. Good size for that only. Not many pockets and zipper is not of great quality. Got what I paid for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: lis

customer_reviews.title: DeMarini Momentum Wheeled Bag - Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for my sons needs. Before we purchased this bag he carried two bags to each game: one for bats, mitts and batting helmet and one for his catchers gear. This DeMarini Momentum Wheeled Bag holds all of his gear so he just has to bring one bag now. Great bag - great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design would never invest the money in another one again
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and no pockets to put anything inside of it... Back of the bag that holds your bat is so short it doesn't fit you have to practically tear the bag to get it to fit. .. Unfortunately I had to leave in 2 days and had no way to return it but I'd never buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Cyndia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bag. It has enough space and wheels
customer_reviews.author: JOCELYN J.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was more sturdy. Have to keep a bat in the compartment to keep it from folding in half.
customer_reviews.author: IrishJohn

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this bag other than the fact the zipper where the bats go broke on the second day of use. He only had one bat in it at the time. It's very nice looking and I even had his name and school put on it, if it wasn't for the zipper I'd give it more stars
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my 10 year old. It has plenty of room for all of her equipment. I would definitely recommend this bag. She has been using it for a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Robin E.

product_meta.title: DeMarini Momentum Wheeled Bag
product_meta.description: The all-new DeMarini Momentum Wheeled Bag is equipped with a bat compartment which can hold up to four bats in addition to a gear compartment for a helmet, glove and more. The rugged wheels will get you from the parking lot to the dugout and everywhere in between. The removable embroidery panel is for you to show off your team pride. Large main compartment fits helmet, glove and gear Individually padded bat sleeves (Up to 4 bats) Removable decoration panel (Fits 18" hoop) Rugged Wheels Interior Shelf to separate players glove or cleats from other gear Massive #10 Zippers on main opening Durable J-Style Fence Hook Inside valuables pockets Dimensions: 36"L x 11"W x 10.5"H
feature_bullets: Large main compartment fits helmet, glove and gear
Individually padded bat sleeves (up to 4 bats)
Interior shelf to separate players glove or cleats from other gear

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
